mapper.insert: insert into resume_tb(user_id, title, content, career, education, skill, award, language, link, file, birthdate, address, finish, created_at) values(#{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{career}, #{education}, #{skill}, #{award}, #{language}, #{link}, #{file}, #{birthdate}, #{address}, #{finish}, now())
mapper.update: update resume_tb set content=#{content}, career=#{career}, skill=#{skill}, award = #{award}, address = #{address}, link = #{link}, education = #{education}, file = #{file}, language = #{language} where id = #{id}
